attribute.name: pmProcessorLoad
attribute.description: The average CPU load on the whole system (all the cores) during the last 5 minutes.
attribute.condition: Automatic and continuous measurement, where the CPU average for the last 5 minutes is calculated every time the value is read. The CPU load is defined as 1 - bg in percent, where bg is defined as background load.

attribute.name: pmLicConnectedUsersHardLimit
attribute.description:
Indicates the hard limit for the number of connected users i.e. the value of the parameter capacityConnectedHardLimit.
Source Attribute: capacityConnectedHardLimit

attribute.name: pmSwitchIngressDiscards
attribute.description:
Total number of cells discarded due to overload in the ingress direction.
This counter is not supported on all boards, see the description of the relevant board.

attribute.name: pmIfStatsDscpOutPkts2
attribute.description: Series of measurements recorded during a reporting period where each measurement is the number of IP packets using one of the DSCP values in the DSCP aggregation group that the IPv4/IPv6 interface supplied to the lower layers for transmission during the measurement interval. The first value in the range will show the current sampling interval.
attribute.condition: This counter is incremented when an IP packet is transmitted using one of the DSCP values configured in the DSCP aggregation group.

attribute.name: pmZtemporary40
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.

attribute.name: pmLicConnectedUsersLevSum
attribute.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for "Connected Users".
attribute.condition: This counter is based on an internal level counter maintaining the current number of Connected Users. Values are read periodically and accumulated.

attribute.name: pmRrcConnTuneOutLevSamp
attribute.description: Number of times the corresponding Sum counter has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRrcConnTuneOutLevSum.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.

attribute.name: pmNoOfDot3StatsLateCollisions
attribute.description: The number of times that a collision was detected on the interface after the minimum length of a frame.

attribute.name: pmIfOutMulticastPkts
attribute.description: The number of transmitted good packets, with a multicast address, that are delivered to a higher sub-layer.
attribute.condition: A good packet with a multicast address is transmitted.

attribute.name: pmNoOfFailedPingsDefaultRouter2
attribute.description: The total number of failed pings towards the defaultRouter2 on the active link only. The counter value survives the link switch when applicable.
attribute.condition: An ICMP Echo Request message has not been replied to.

attribute.name: pmMeanAtmConnSetupIntensity
attribute.description:
The average number of connection setups per second during the ROP period.
Only applicable for IPv4.

attribute.name: pmIfOutUcastPkts
attribute.description: The total number of outgoing unicast ethernet frames requested to be transmitted (including those that were discarded or not sent).
attribute.condition: An output unicast packet is requested to be transmitted.

attribute.name: pmIfStatsDscpOutPkts
attribute.description: Series of measurements recorded during a reporting period where each measurement is the number of IP packets using one of the DSCP values in the DSCP aggregation group that the IPv4/IPv6 interface supplied to the lower layers for transmission during the measurement interval. The first value in the range will show the current sampling interval.
attribute.condition: This counter is incremented when an IP packet is transmitted using one of the DSCP values configured in the DSCP aggregation group.

attribute.name: pmIfStatsDscpInOctets
attribute.description: Series of measurements recorded during a reporting period where each measurement is the number of octets in input IP packets received by the IPv4/IPv6 interface including those received with invalid address but excluding packets received with error in the IP header error using one of the DSCP values in the DSCP aggregation group during the measurement interval. Octets from packets in pmIfStatsDscpInPkts must be counted here. The first value in the range will show the current sampling interval.
attribute.condition: This counter is incremented when an IP packet is received using one of the DSCP values configured in the DSCP aggregation group.
